unique_internal_blocks.title: Overview
unique_internal_blocks.text: The principal mission of the National Bank of Cambodia is to determine and direct the monetary policy aimed at maintaining price stability.

unique_internal_blocks.title: Reserve Requirements
unique_internal_blocks.text: Reserve Requirement is one of the monetary policy instruments used by the National Bank of Cambodia in order to control the speed of credit growth.

unique_internal_blocks.title: Exchange Rate Policy
unique_internal_blocks.text: The National Bank of Cambodia's exchange rate policy is one of the key tools in the NBC's monetary policy. The objective is to achieve price stability.
